title.rendered: VIDEO: Guest Host on Hustle & Grit with Treadstone Law

content.rendered:
Hustle & Grit: Hugo Dos Reis guest hosts

Hugo Dos Reis joins Haris Zulqarnain of Treadstone Law on the Hustle & Grit video podcast to discuss mortgage advice in today’s economy.

Treadstone Law is a Digital Law Firm with the experience to close real estate transactions across Ontario. They complete everything without you having to visit their office. 

Haris Zulqarnain, Treadstone Law
W: treadstonelaw.ca
E: haris@treadstonelaw.ca

excerpt.rendered: Hugo Dos Reis joins Haris Zulqarnain of Treadstone Law on the Hustle & Grit podcast to discuss mortgage advice in today’s economy.
